name: Gamer Pakka
description:
An evil business ape man, Biggit has commissioned Dr. Plataduck to create a serum to make his workers work endlessly to collect money across the world. Instead, it created an army of  overworked zombies, and invaded Fun World to infect people with their workaholic attitude. It's up to Gamer Pakka to save the day or will he lose his family in the process.

Controls:

Keyboard:

X/S - normal attacks

Z/A - Special attacks

Retutrn - Pause

Gamepad:

A/X - normal attack

Z/A - Special attack

+ - pause.
